About

I've been in the academe and government for more than 10 years. Much of my work is academic and I'm a fan of MOOCs.

I enjoy self-directed learning and listening to The Cure, The Smiths, and spawns alike. A Star Wars fan by heart.

I used to chair a department for a number of years and serve our country as CHED technical committee member until I decided to step down and continue my passion for learning. The reason for building this site: to chronicle my so-called academic life. Or not.

Welcome and enjoy.
